value.stringValue: Salesforce CTS RMS Losant Event Process process didn't start: No matching records found
Salesforce CTS RMS Losant Event Process process didn't start: Multiple matching records found

actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: POST LOSANT EVENT DETAILS TO CHATTER

rules.name: eventContextGtOneCheckRule
rules.label: Context Check Decision - Greater than One

textTemplates.description: text template for when multiple records are records found
textTemplates.name: multipleRecordsFoundTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!OrganizationName} Admin,
The CTS RMS Losant Event Process process is configured to start when a LosantEvent platform event message occurs. A LosantEvent message occurred, but the process didn't start because multiple records in your org match the values specified in the process's Object node.
Here are the values from the LosantEvent message. equipmentSiebelCRMID: {!myVariable_myEvent.equipmentCRMID__c}
To fix this issue, adjust the matching filters in the process's Object node.
Thank you, Salesforce Process Automation

textTemplates.description: text template for no records found
textTemplates.name: noRecordsFoundTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!OrganizationName} Admin,
The CTS RMS Losant Event Process process is configured to start when a LosantEvent platform event message occurs. A LosantEvent message occurred, but the process didn't start because no records in your org match the values specified in the process's Object node.
Here are the values from the LosantEvent message. equipmentSiebelCRMID: {!myVariable_myEvent.equipmentCRMID__c}
To fix this issue, adjust the matching filters in the process's Object node.
Thank you, Salesforce Process Automation
